version_description:
- Live experience improved.
- Bug fixed.

Major UI design improvement!
- You can find which host is on Radio mode right away from the list.
- Bigger buttons for better accuracy.
- Bigger chat UI so you can read the text more easily.
- Put colors on the buttons to make them beautiful

Live room list design improved.
Bug fixed.

- Check the profile of viewers as soon as they get in or become fans of yours! (You can touch the name of the user on chat UI and see his/her mini profile.)
- Easily find out who is talking when it’s on radio mode! When a user speaks, blue circle moves.

- Payout is finally here! You can now exchange stars to cash.
- Did you know who sent you stars the most? Find out in your Top fans.
- Send gifts and get Hakuna Crown to stand out from the community!
- Bug fixes and improvements.

- You can now check star/diamond rankings. Find out the most popular user and the most active supporter.
- You can now invite audience as a guest-streamer. In addition, invite-only mode allows you to talk to the audience that you want to engage with.
- Joining as a guest-streamer has also been simplified. The default mode for entering as a guest has been changed to radio-mode, and the audience can now hear the guest as soon as he/she becomes a guest.
- The chatting UI design has been further improved. Chats by Top Fans and Crown users is now more visible.

1. Finally, host can send gifts to guest. Welcome your guest with gifts.
2. Audience can send one free star to the host 1 minute after joining the live room. Tell your newly-joined audience to stay and send one!
3. Host can set welcome message to show to the audience. As soon as audience joins your live room, he/she will see your welcome message.
4. Some of users' profile pictures will appear right next to the host's name. Users with crown or top fans will appear first.
5. Gift message has been improved, so that no one can miss it.

You can start a private room. Talk privately with your fans.
You can leave a post on another user's Fan Board.
You got a Ranking badge! Let others know!
Fixed bugs.
New Hakuna crowns have been added!
Fixed some bugs.

You can make a team in Hakuna!
- If you join a team, you will be able to see your team's symbol from the live room list and your mini profile.
- If you send stars to your team member, he/she will get 10% more stars!

All new ranking system!
- Top 1 will get a reward every day and every week.
- Team ranking has been added.
- All members of the Top 1 team will get a reward.

Get your Hakuna premium!
- You can get monthly diamonds.
- The longer you are subscribed, the more bonus diamonds you will be able to get when you make a purchase.
- The longer you are subscribed, the more bonus stars you will get when receiving gifts.

- Improved sound quality.
- You can now mute.
- You can hide UI when you touch the screen.
You can unblock users you blocked.
Improved usability and fixed bugs.

1. A NEW Level System is here!
- You can now level up with your everyday activities on HAKUNA.
- Level up and get various benefits including HAKUNA Crown and Diamond gifts.

2. Surprise your host with a Voice Gift!
- You can now send gifts with voice messages.

3. You can share Live broadcasts with your friends.
- Share your favorite Hakuna broadcast and spread how fun it is to be on Hakuna!

4. New features for hosts have been added.
- New features (Mirror, Camera rotation, Mute mode., etc) are now available for hosts.
- We have updated a face filter to make your broadcast much brighter than before!

5. Hosts and Guests can now chat when live!
- Enjoy communicating with viewers in a variety of ways.

- You can find ‘Kuna’ (our cute bird character) hidden inside the app : New app Icon, splash screen and loading images are added.
- Improved usability and fixed bugs.

- We have added a user search feature. Now you can quickly find your favorite hosts and follow!
- You can ‘follow back’ the user who is following you in the mini-profile.
- Broadcast sound quality has been improved.

1. We have added an Item Store!
- Purchase fancy entrance effects in item store and show off your presence when you enter the live room.
- Various items will be added to the item store in the future.

2. ‘Live Boost’ is here!
- You can check your live room ranking when broadcasting
- Boost your live room ranking using ‘Live Boost’

3. Notification Center now available in Hakuna.
- You can see all the notifications at once.
- You can selectively receive notifications you want through notification setting.

4. Communicate more actively with fan board notifications!
- You can be notified when the host you follow writes a new post.
- Notification will be sent when your fan writes on your fan board

5. You can change the room title and the welcome message during live.

6. Various broadcasting tips have been added for users to make better use of Hakuna.

7. Age will not be shown to other users any more.

8. Improved usability and fixed bugs.

9. Broadcast sound quality has been improved.

1. You can assign a manager now.
- With a manager, it will be much easier to manage your live room.

2. Gift sending experience has been upgraded!
- You can check how much EXP is needed for the next crown when sending gifts.

1. We have launched the Lite version of Hakuna Premium.
- Subscribe to get monthly bonus diamonds and live boost benefits.
- You can get more bonus diamonds with longer subscription periods.

2. We have added the announce message in the live room.
- When the host or guest receives Palace gift, the message will be shown to all live rooms.
- When the host or guest becomes Star Ranking Top 1, the message will be shown to all live rooms.
Improved usability and fixed bugs.

1. Categories have been added to the liveroom list.
- You can select to watch live rooms of newly registered hosts.
2. The badge for our partner hosts is added.

1. We have renewed the Live start screen. Start live with ease on the brand new screen!
2. We added filters for the live room list.
- You can use the filter to only see video or radio live rooms
- You can exclude private rooms from the list.
Improved usability and fixed bugs.

1. We have added a new face filter.
2. Improved usability and fixed bugs.
Fixed bugs and improved usability.

1. Hakuna’s new feature! Multi-guest has been added.
- You can invite up to 3 guests.
- Select how many guests you want and start your live!

2. You can easily change guest settings during live.
- You can change the number of guests and the guest mode whenever you want!
- If you want to change invite/open mode, use the guest setting button in the live room.

3. You can broadcast with the full screen now.
- You can broadcast alone when you select 0 guest.
- Fly solo with your contents!
Fixed bugs and improved usability.

1. Notice Board is added
- You can inform viewers with the Notice Board anytime you want
- You can check the host’s notice by clicking the notice button

2. You can see your fan ranking.
- You can check how much gifting was made by each fan by clicking the star badge in live room.
- You can also find fan ranking menu at My page

3. Sending item to friends is now available
- You can send items in the item store such as Entrance Effect, Crown and Live Boost to your friends from the item store.
- Send items and make your friends happy!

4. Twitter login is available
Fixed bugs and improved usability.

Play center has been added. 
Host a fun broadcast with play items!

1. Broadcasting Keywords are added
- You can select a keyword that describes your broadcast.
- By using Keywords, you can meet new people with common interests much faster!
- You can also change the keyword during broadcasting.

2. Hosts to follow are recommended
- New users will be suggested with host recommendations to follow.
- Follow the recommended hosts and enjoy broadcasting.

1. Now, you can expand your team members up to 10
- With TEAM+ item, you can add more team members!
- Make your team stronger with TEAM+!

2. Apple login option is added.

3. A third gender option has been updated in the Gender Option to choose when you register.

1. Live Room Recommendation Feature has been updated.
2. AR effect has been added. You can start using AR effects when you go live.
3. Fixed bugs and improved usability.

1. Confirmation process of personal information has been added.
2. Poll Feature in the Live Room has been added.
3. Grace period for account deletion has been added.
Direct Messaging feature has been added.

1. You can now appoint one additional manager.
2. Gifts can be sent to users in the Live Room through their Mini Profile.
You can now sign up into teams!
Fixed bugs and improved usability.

- You can apply the "Face beauty effect" when starting the live room.
- You can invite your follower to a different Host’s live room.

- The option to reject Gifting through Mini Profile has been added.
- The option to receive DMs only from users you are following has been added.
Fixed bugs and improved usability.
Fixed bugs and improved usability.
- Adopted SMS verification process
Fixed bugs and improved usability.

- 'Fan board' has been updated.
- 'Group Live' feature is coming. Stay tuned!
Fixed bugs and improved usability.

Join Head-To-Head in Play Center, where users can compete!
Fixed bugs and improved usability.
You can share various photos with your profile photo history!
Fixed bugs and improved usability.

A new feature 'Mailbox' has been updated.

Get EXP and rewards by completing daily missions!
